answers.answer: My SIL got a result saying her last baby had a high chance of Down syndrome, sorry don't remember the exact number but it was a false positive, he is perfectly healthy, she had an amnio done to be sure. Statistically there is way more false positives than real ones. Try to stay calm, and call your doctor in the morning for clarification.

I was told I had a very high marker because of my diabetes and previous high blood pressure and because of my age because I'm 31 but when I got my Down syndrome marker they told me that I was at higher risk then when the results came back it was like one in five thousand

I understand the benefits of all the tests these days but ive had 2 kids and never got tests done like they offer now and my kids were fine and i had less stress to worry about. Just pray and have faith in a healthy baby and love the blessing God gives you.

question: Hi mums just quickly i had my down syndrome test done and the results came back and it was 1 in 92 and im only 27. Does anyone know what it means?? I still have to wait for my nt scan results to come in on Friday but im abit worried to be honest
title: down syndrome results
